short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UI Automation tool that works in the DevConsole. Ideal for writing e2e front-end tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bela allows you to write scripts to automate UI testing. In contrast to other tools, it seamlessly integrates into your development process and allows you to write tests right where you develop your application w/o switching context. 

Bela has concise and expressive syntax and works faster than similar tool as it uses modern technologies to archive its goals. 

If you have any issue, please report them on the GitHub repository. If you are missing a feature - your contributions are welcomed :).
